title: Jax Taylor on his new bride Brittany Cartwright hooking up with other women: 'I'm OK with it'
text:
These newlyweds are ready to approach their relationship from an open-minded perspective.

Vanderpump Rules star Jax Taylor, who married his sweetheart Brittany Cartwright from the show earlier this year, told TooFab over the weekend that it 'doesn't bother' him if his new wife sleeps with others—as long as those others are 'certain women.'

Taylor, 40, was stopped on the street Friday night and asked whether he would consider it cheating if Brittany were to sleep with another woman.

What a gentleman: Vanderpump Rules star Jax Taylor said over the weekend that it 'doesn't bother' him if his new wife sleeps with others—as long as those others are 'certain women'

The former model's answer was simple: 'Personally, me, I don't care.'

'It doesn't bother me,' he continued.

He did however specify that he does not have an open relationship, 'at all.'

Taylor specifically is OK with Cartwright hooking up with 'certain women, that I know.'

Pump sweethearts: Jax married his reality costar Brittany Cartwright earlier this year in Kentucky

He also acknowledged that his feelings on the matter were potentially unique, and that if varies from couple to couple.

'I have friends that would never allow that,' he explained. 'I have friends that would say "no," I have friends that are OK with it...

'It depends on the guy,' he concluded.

He's OK with it: Taylor specified that he is cool with Cartwright hooking up with 'certain women, that I know'

Brittany and Jax began dating in 2015 after they met in Las Vegas, and their courtship was featured on their Bravo reality series Vanderpump Rules.

In 2017, the pair split for awhile after it was publicly revealed that Jax slept with another woman.

Nonetheless, the couple eventually reunited, going on to marry in Kentucky this past summer.
description: These newlyweds are ready to approach their relationship from an open-minded perspective. Jax Taylor of Vanderpump Rules said that it 'doesn't bother' him if his new wife sleeps with other women.
